Package org.apache.lenya.lucene.index

Interface Summary
DocumentCreator An object of a class implementing this interface creates Lucene documents from files.
Indexer The indexer interface
IndexIteratorHandler Index Iterator interface
 

Class Summary
AbstractDocumentCreator Abstract document creator
AbstractIndexer Abstract base class for indexers.
AbstractIndexIteratorHandler Abstact base class for Index handling
ConfigurableDocumentCreator Uses XSLT to transform a XML into a Lucene document
ConfigurableIndexer A configurable indexer
DefaultDocumentCreator The default document creator
DefaultIndexer The default indexer
Index Index.
IndexInformation Helper class to hold some indexing data during the indexing process
IndexIterator The index Iterator
